summary: Shinya Yamanaka   is a Japanese physician.
full_text:
Osaka City University  , abbreviated to Ichidai or Shidai , is a public university in Japan. It is located in Sumiyoshi-ku, Osaka.
^ "Osaka City University Prospectus 2012-2013" . Osaka City University. p. 2. Retrieved 2012-10-16. 
^ a b c d e f g "Osaka City University: Number of Staff & Students". May 2012. Retrieved 2012-10-16.
title: Osaka City University
